          <title>
            <string language="en">The Outer Planets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Äußeren Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Planètes extérieures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Planetas Exteriores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Pianeti Esterni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εξωτερικοί πλανήτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Planetas Externos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Scientists are plotting a trip to the outer planets.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaftler plotten eine Reise zu den

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les scientifiques tracent un voyage aux planètes

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los científicos están trazando un viaje a los

          </keyword>
